subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Nolan Smith had 20 points and fifth-ranked Duke ended No. 6 North Carolina’s run of big comebacks at the Atlantic Coast Conference tournament, beating the Tar Heels 75-58 in Sunday’s final in Greensboro, N.C.
snippet: Nolan Smith had 20 points and fifth-ranked Duke ended No. 6 North Carolina’s run of big comebacks at the Atlantic Coast Conference tournament, beating the Tar Heels 75-58 in Sunday’s final in Greensboro, N.C.
